titleStmt.title: The lamentable fall of Queene Elnor, who for her pride and wickednesse by Gods iudgement, sunke into the ground at Charing crosse, and rose up at Queene hive. To the tune of Gentle and courteous.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,
